title: Prime clusters and Riecoin
summary:
Prime clusters are sets of primes that appear as close together as isÂ generally possible. There is one pair of consecutive prime numbers, 2 and 3, but there cannot be any more: in any larger pair of consecutive numbers, one of the pair will be even. But there are a lot of twin primes, perhaps infinitely […]
